WordCamp Brisbane, 2015

Recently, I gave a talk at WordCamp Brisbane 2015 relating to Modern Design. It covered topics like designing in the browser, mobile first and focusing on data. I've decided to post my slides and speaker notes for future reference.

Flexbox 101

I gave a talk to Brisbane Web Design meet up about my work with TEAM Mentor recently, specifically building responsive web applications with Flexbox. I have included screenshots and my speaker notes in this post for anyone who may find them interesting.
